title: 01949 Not posting (LR357)
message:
Remember, no need to pulse power button to turn it on.
In fact, phold down power button 4-5s, until turns off.
Then press and hold T key; do not press powr button again!
T2 machines automatically turns on by clicking trackpad, or pressing any key.
